page.title: 04Cheadle Hulme Baker's Shop.
page.content: The local corner baker's shop, {'Peter's Pantry',}has been open 14 years and has 4 full time and 3 part time staff. The bakery and the shop open at 6.30 am and the busiest time is from 12 noon until l.30 pm. Trade has {increased 50%}since the closure of schools at dinner time. It is a{family business}selling homemade bread,cakes,pies and sandwiches. It makes wedding cakes and caters for special occasions.The most popular food sold is{granary bread and {fudge slices}.Waste food is thrown away but sometimes waste cakes can be used to make truffles. The shop delivers to other shops, restaurants and pubs,occasionally advertising in newspapers. 40% of the customers are regulars, because the personal service is very popular. {
